title: Design and Effect Analysis of OMO-Based Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD), enhancing interaction through real-time data analysis

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% engagement in science experiment simulations through the OMO model
Learners voluntarily propose ideas three or more times in VR-based collaborative activities
Learners attain an average score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in post-course satisfaction surveys
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
